title: Ferrari's radio show not its biggest issue - Miami GP takeaways
summary: McLaren stole the show at the 2025 Miami Grand Prix with a dominant 1-2 finish that left rivals trembling. Here are the key takeaways from a pivotal weekend in Formula 1
